heading: hopping mad
subheading: a judge has ruled that the energizer battery folks -- whose drum-beating bunny just keeps going, and going, and going, can't use their pink rabbit to attack competitors' products. gillette, which is behind energizer's main competitor, duracell, filed suit to deep-six the bunny's latest ad campaign, which implies that the energizer battery is superior to anything duracell makes. despite tests that seem to back up the claim, a judge ruled for gillette after concluding that the tests were unscientific. energizer got a charge out of that, and an appeal is being considered. they just keep suing, and suing, and suing....
